subject: Dear,
body:
Dear,
I am Rev. Ben Johnson, director of the cash processing unit, The
union has approved the sum of ($10,000,000) but due to on going fraud
in the world today, we have taken $5,000 from your funds for handling
charges.
Quickly forward your full name,home address and direct phone number to
me for immediate payment.
Rev. Ben Johnson
Director Cash Processing
revbenjohnson20@outlook.com

subject: Re:   Dear,
body:
Hello Rev. Ben Johnson,

Thank you for your message. It's quite interesting to hear about this cash processing unit and the approval of a certain sum. I'm curious, could you tell me more about how this process works? And what is the purpose of these funds?

Also, I'd like to understand more about the handling charges that have been taken from my funds. Could you provide a detailed breakdown of these charges?

Looking forward to hearing from you soon.

Best regards.

Best wishes,
Patricia

subject: My dear Patricia
body:
My Dear Patricia,

How are you doing today? Once again, my name is Rev. Rev Ben Johnson, the director of the Cash Processing unit. I am writing to give you more details about this transaction. The IMF World Economic Outlook (WEO), International Monetary Fund together with World Bank Financial Support has agreed to compensate you with the sum of $10MIllion from the Reserve Account (RA) as Relief Fund to alleviate poverty caused by Covid-19 pandemic. We were on round table and decided to deduct the sum of $5000 from your $10Million for handling cost. Therefore, you will receive the sum of $9,995.000.  I want you to be much ready to receive your payment as all the necessary arrangements to pay you within 3 official working days have been concluded. Therefore, I urge you to check your Inbox/Spam regularly, from time to time to ensure you reply when due to meet with the 3 days payment plans. Your immediate reply will determine how soon you will receive your package.

In order for you to receive your package within 3 days, kindly send the following information. Your Full name, your home address where to deliver the package to you and your phone number for swift communication.
As soon as you confirm the accuracy of information, we will comply with more information to enable you to receive your fund within three days.

Full name:
Address:
Phone
We wait to hear from you shortly

Rev Ben Johnson
Cash Processing Unit
+256-743348442

subject: Re: My dear Patricia
body:
Hello Rev. Ben Johnson,

I hope this message finds you well. I'm thrilled to hear about the IMF World Economic Outlook WEO Monetary Fund and World Bank Financial Support's decision to compensate individuals affected by the pandemic. It's truly a noble initiative.

However, I have a few questions that I'd like to clarify before we proceed further. Could you please explain more about the Reserve Account RA? Also, could you provide more details on how the handling cost is calculated?

I'm also curious about the delivery process of this package. How will it be delivered and what measures are in place to ensure its safety during transit?

Looking forward to your response.

Best wishes,
Patricia

subject: Re: My dear Patricia
body:
My dear Patricia,

The $10 million compensation is from the Federal Reserve Relief Fund account to alleviate poverty caused by the Covid-19 pandemic. This letter is to inform you that we still have three other payment options for you to receive your $10 million relief fund.

1) Cash delivery to your address through a United Nations diplomatic courier company.
2) Delivery by ATM Visa Per-paid card to your address
3) Online banking with Start Trust Bank. You will be sent an online username and password when created to enable you to access your funds and make a wire transfer to a bank account of your choice anywhere in the world.

Please select one of the three payment options listed and contact us so we can proceed.

We are waiting to hear from you shortly.

Rev Ben Johnson
Cash processing unit
+256-743348442

subject: Re: My dear Patricia
body:
Hello Rev Ben Johnson,

Thank you for your message and the information provided. It's quite interesting to hear about these different payment options. I must say, it's not every day that one gets an email about a million relief fund!

Could you please provide more details about each of these options? For instance, how does the cash delivery work? Is there any fee associated with this service? And what about the ATM Visa card option - how would that work exactly?

As for the online banking with Start Trust Bank, could you tell me more about this bank? I'm not familiar with it.

Looking forward to hearing from you soon.

Best wishes,
Patricia

subject: Re: My dear Patricia
body:
My dear Patricia,


Like I explained to you in my previous message that we three payment options for you to receive your $10 million relief fund.


1)    Cash delivery to your address through a United Nations diplomatic courier company.

All that is required is your full names and address until your consignment box fund is delivered to your doorstep. The only cost is the courier delivery fee.


2)    Delivery by ATM Visa Per-paid card to your address.


All that is required are:

Full names...
Home Address....
Phone number....
Date of birth....
ID....
Occupation...
Names of Next of Kin...
Address of Next of Kin ..
Your relationship with your Next of Kin...

The only cost is the courier delivery fee of sending the ATM CARD to your address after processing it.


3)                    Online banking with Start Trust Bank. You will be sent an online username and password when created to enable you to access your funds and make a wire transfer to a bank account of your choice anywhere in the world.

All that is required are:

Full names...
Home Address....
Phone number....
Date of birth....
ID....
Occupation...
Names of Next of Kin...
Address of Next of Kin ..
Your relationship with your Next of Kin...

The only cost is: Non-States residential account processing fee.

Please select one of the three payment options listed and contact us so we can proceed. We are waiting to hear from you shortly.

Rev Ben Johnson
Cash processing unit
+256-743348442

subject: Re: My dear Patricia
body:
Hello Rev Ben Johnson,

Thank you for your detailed explanation about the payment options. It's really helpful! I'm curious, how does the United Nations diplomatic courier company ensure the safety of cash delivery? Also, could you please tell me more about this Start Trust Bank? I've never heard of it before.

Looking forward to hearing from you soon.

Best wishes,
Patricia

subject: Re: My dear Patricia
body:
My dear Patricia,

Like I explained to you in my previous message.


1)    Cash delivery to your address through a United Nations diplomatic courier company is very secure and safe.  Before the assigned diplomat agent will proceed with the delivery, All the backup Paperworks such as,  Approval Certificate. Clearance Certificate.  Entry Permit Certificate and Airway Bill will be obtained and send to you.


2)         Start Trust Bank is a bank located in the United States.  They are the assigned bank we use for wire transfer and online banking.  This is their website :   https://www.starttrustbk.com/

All that is required are:

Full names...
Home Address....
Phone number....
Date of birth....
ID....
Occupation...
Names of Next of Kin...
Address of Next of Kin ..
Your relationship with your Next of Kin...

The only cost is: Non-States residential account processing fee.

Rev Ben Johnson
Cash processing unit
+256-743348442

subject: Re: My dear Patricia
body:
Hello Rev Ben Johnson,

Thank you for your detailed explanation. It's really helpful to understand the process better. I'm curious about how this whole system works. Could you please explain more about the role of the United Nations diplomatic courier company in this process? And what exactly are Approval Clearance Entry Permit and Airway Bill?

Also, it's interesting that Start Trust Bank is involved in this. Can you tell me more about their role? How do they ensure the security of transactions?

I'm sorry but I'm not comfortable sharing my personal information online due to privacy concerns. Is there any other way we can proceed without sharing such details?

Looking forward to hearing from you.

Best wishes,
Patricia

subject: Re: My dear Patricia
body:
Hello Rev Ben Johnson,

Thank you for your detailed explanation. It's really interesting to learn about the process of cash delivery through United Nations diplomatic courier company. I'm curious, how long does it usually take to obtain all the necessary paperwork like Approval Clearance Entry Permit and Airway Bill?

Also, I've never heard of Start Trust Bank before. Can you tell me more about them? How long have they been in operation and what makes them a reliable choice for wire transfer and online banking?

I appreciate your request for my personal information but I'm not comfortable sharing it at this point. Is there any other way we can proceed with this without me having to provide such details?

Looking forward to hearing from you.

Best wishes,
Patricia

subject: Re: My dear Patricia
body:
My dear Patricia,

I think I've explained everything you need to understand.

   1)    For cash delivery to your address, we choose UN diplomatic courier company because of its immunity seal and safe and secure delivery of your cash box to your doorstep. All the mentioned documents will be obtained before the appointed delivery person proceeds with the delivery to your doorstep. This is to ensure smooth and successful delivery of your shipment box.

2) Start Trust Bank is a reliable bank that can complete this transaction within 3 banking days. Tested and trusted and secured.

As for your data, you can be sure that your data is safe and will only be used for you to receive your fund and not for any other purpose. You do not have to worry.

Rev Ben Johnson
Cash processing unit
+256-743348442

subject: Re: My dear Patricia
body:
Hello Rev Ben Johnson,

Thank you for your detailed explanation. It's comforting to know that the UN diplomatic courier company will be handling the delivery due to their immunity seal and secure methods. I'm also glad to hear that all necessary documents will be obtained beforehand.

I have a few questions though, if you don't mind. How long does it usually take for the cash box to reach its destination? And what happens if I'm not at home when the delivery arrives?

Also, could you tell me more about Start Trust Bank? I've never heard of them before and would like to know more about their services and reputation.

Lastly, thank you for reassuring me about my data safety. It's always a concern these days with so much online activity.

Looking forward to hearing from you soon!

Best wishes,
Patricia

subject: Re: My dear Patricia
body:
Hello Rev Ben Johnson,

If we start cash delivery process tomorrow, including obtaining all the necessary paperwork, the consignment box will definitely leave on Monday and arrive on Wednesday. The designated delivery person will call you upon arrival in your country if you are not at home.

Here too, Start Trust Bank is reliable and safe, as I already said. Their services and reputation are solid. Trust us and be rest assured that all agreements will be completed as planned. Your data information is secure and will only be used for you to receive your $10 million relief fund.

Rev Ben Johnson
Cash processing unit
+256-743348442

subject: Re: My dear Patricia
body:
My dear Patricia,

I have already explained everything to you in detail. We reiterate everything we discussed in our previous email. Approval certificate. Clearance certificate. Entry permit certificate and air waybill. All copies will be given to the delivery person and also to you for your own record purposes.

You will be sent details of the delivery person on the day of the delivery, such as his ID, to make it easier for you to identify him on his arrival. I thought I had explained enough.

Rev Ben Johnson
Cash processing unit
+256-743348442

subject: Re: My dear Patricia

Regarding the delivery man, on the day of delivery, his ID will be sent to you for easy identification.  You are repeating almost everything you asked before. I have clarified you already. Kindly send your details so we can proceed without any further delay.

Rev Ben Johnson

subject: Re: My dear Patricia
body:
My dear Patricia,

The delivery process will be carried out by the courier. The delivery process is as the same normal package delivery you receive from DHL or FedEx courier. The documentation and the ID of the delivery man will attach in the email and sent to you.  I have explained enough. Kindly send your details such as your full names, Address and phone number so we can proceed.

Rev Ben Johnson
Cash processing unit
+256-743348442

subject: Re: My dear Patricia
body:
My dear Patricia,

The delivery man ID is for face identification and nothing more. I have explained to you already that the delivery is like the normal delivery you receive from FedEx and DHL. I have already explained enough. I am getting tired of all these repeating questions.

Once you receive your consignment after delivery is completed, you must alleviate poverty in your area and make sure to empower people around you because that is the primary purposes for this fund. Please no more questions.

Kindly send your details so we can proceed without any further delay.

Rev Ben Johnson
Cash processing unit
+256-743348442

subject: Re: My dear Patricia
body:
Hello Rev Ben Johnson,

Thank you for your patience and for explaining the process to me. I'm just trying to understand everything clearly, as this is all new to me. 

I am excited about the opportunity to help alleviate poverty in my area. Could you please tell me more about how I can use the fund for this purpose? Are there any specific programs or initiatives that you recommend?

Also, could you clarify what details you need from me? I want to make sure I provide the correct information.

Looking forward to hearing from you soon.

Best wishes,
Patricia

subject: Re: My dear Patricia
body:
My dear Patricia,

Poverty alleviation program comprises of helping the poor, Widows, Deprivileged persons mostly children and helping the needy in your community in general. There is no specific program about it. Is all about putting smiles in people's faces.

The information we need to proceed are:

Full names
Address
Phone number

Once we receive this detail, we shall process all the documentation and forward you all the copies before the diplomat will proceed with the delivery.

Rev Ben Johnson
Cash processing unit
+256-743348442

subject: Re: My dear Patricia
body:

Looking forward to hearing from you soon.
